roleset.name: to gather or pick nuts
roleset.note: NUT-V NOTES: Frames file for 'nut' based on dictionary.com. Verbnet entry 13.7. frame by Perryn (from nut.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: ARG0
example.text: Grandma explained that people-1 commonly went *trace*-1 nutting to the nut trees, and gathered for themselves.
